title: List of all Android bug report  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android bug report  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: shaketobug-android
repoList.description: [ABANDONED] - Shaketobug easy to use in-app bug reporting library for android

repoList.name: bugsnap-android
repoList.description: An Android Library enabling users to report bugs directly from their mobile device.

repoList.name: ANDROID-CrashReporterLibrary
repoList.description: A single file library that allows you to receive bug reports of your apps.

repoList.name: bugmailer
repoList.description: An android library used to send bug report via email

repoList.name: android-bugreport
repoList.description: A simple bug report library that captures app debug info along with a screenshot

repoList.name: DirectBugReporting
repoList.description: An Android library to help you get error reports from your users

repoList.name: AndroidScreenshotReporting
repoList.description: Tool used to help QA teams for easier Android bug reporting. This library enables you to take screenshots of your applications and directly submit them to a project managament service via email.

repoList.name: Shake-To-Report
repoList.description: An android library to let user report bugs and issues by shaking on the phone on any screen.

repoList.name: Android-Log-Tracker
repoList.description: Android Log Tracker – is a library for collecting, filtering, saving and formating log messages for creating and sending bug reports.

repoList.name: feedbackt
repoList.description: Build it day prototype: Android library for doing light weight in app reporting of bugs
